column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Ginger says : " I ca n't believe my boyfriend is a real life hero ! "
#Text=Bolin says : " Boyfriend ?
#Text=Of course we 're a couple .
#Text=" Asami says : " Bolin you saved the president !
#Text=And you proved Mako was right all along .
#Text=We have to go tell him what happened .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Yeah !
#Text=Oh , you meant right now .
#Text=" Korra says : " President Raiko !
#Text=" Raiko says : " Avatar Korra ?
#Text=What 's wrong ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Sir , I know I 've asked for your help before , but things have changed .
#Text=Unalaq does n't just wan na take over the South anymore .
#Text=He wants to destroy the whole world .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Unalaq is going to destroy the world ?
#Text=He really does have a doomsday device ?
#Text=" Korra says : " He 's trying to release a powerful dark spirit during Harmonic Convergence , which is only a few days away .
#Text=If he succeeds , the world as we know it , is over .
#Text=Sir , we desperately need your help .
#Text=" Raiko says : " I 'm sorry , Korra , but my answer is still no .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " There are lives on the line !
#Text=And my daughter is one of them !
#Text=Raiko , you must reconsider !
#Text=" Raiko says : " I 'm aware that lives are on the line .
#Text=And that 's precisely why my troops are staying here .
#Text=If the world is going to be thrown into chaos as you claim , I need to protect my citizens .
#Text=I 'm sorry .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Sir , Nuktuk needs your help .
#Text=I know you love helping people .
#Text=" Raiko says : " Son , I appreciate you saving my life and I 'm a big fan of your work , but my decision is final .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Never should have saved that guy .
#Text=" Asami says : " If you guys need help , I 'm here for you .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Yeah , me too .
#Text=" Korra says : " Thank you .
#Text=It 's so good to see you guys again .
#Text=Wait .
#Text=Where 's Mako ?
#Text="
